trans-unit.target: TEXT_CTSMKDWEPTRADE3_00967_GEROLT_000_000<tab>Time to see what aetheric conversion's done to me hammer─an' what that'll do to yer phantom weapon!
TEXT_CTSMKDWEPTRADE3_00967_GEROLT_000_002<tab>Success! If ye'd asked me but moments ago, I'd have sworn ye couldn't achieve aetheric harmony as perfect as this...
TEXT_CTSMKDWEPTRADE3_00967_GEROLT_000_003<tab>Behold the frightenin' power o' the void made manifest: <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var>!
TEXT_CTSMKDWEPTRADE3_00967_GEROLT_000_004<tab>Behold the frightenin' power o' the void made manifest: <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var> an' <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8030202 /var>!
TEXT_CTSMKDWEPTRADE3_00967_GEROLT_000_005<tab>See how that suits ye. 'Course, unless you put in the practice, even the finest arms'll feel like a lump o' scrap iron in yer hands.
TEXT_CTSMKDWEPTRADE3_00967_GEROLT_000_006<tab>In other words, ye've got to use the bleedin' thing. Swing it about, fell some fiends─do what ye do best, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>!
